patches.content:
class Towel:
    def __init__(self, color: str, size: str):
        self.color: str = "" #atributo
        self.size: str = ""
        self.wetness: int = 0


# referencias
minha: Towel = Towel("blue", "P")
minha.color = "blue"
minha.size = "G"


esposa = Towel("red", "G")
esposa.color = "red"
esposa.size = "G"

gaiato = esposa



print("Qual a cor da sua toalha")
color = input()
towel: Towel = Towel(color, "P")
print(towel.color)
